product_details.description: Super Breathable Mesh Vamp: Lightweight, Soft, Comfortable, Wash resistance, They won't deform after clean the sneakers. Breathable and durable air mesh upper allow the foot to breathe. Protect Your ankle: Slip-on ankle design allows you easily put on/off. Shoes's tongue and heels protect your feet from hurt in any activities. Provide more comfort. Slip-Resistance and Durable:Premium Hollow Blade Sole Offers Maximum Durability and Provides the Optimum Cushioning Performance that Creates a Slow Shock Jump, Soft, Comfortableand and Healthier Shoe Environment. Perfect choice to pair with any sport or casual assemble. Suitable for parties, casual, walking, running, indoor, sports, outdoor, travel, exercise, workout and any occasion. Free Running: Stretch breathable mesh upper for ultra-lightweight support and breathability, springblade sole can superb energy return and durability, ensures your feet feel more freedom, allowing to move the way they were meant to, to enjoy the unparalleled pleasure of free running. Fabric type - Mesh ** Origin - Imported ** Sole material - Ethylene Vinyl Acetate ** Outer material - Mesh **

banner_details:
The banner displays a modern, futuristic theme designed to promote a pair of walking shoes. At the center is a highly detailed product image ("product_image") enclosed within stylized concentric circles that enhance visual focus. The main header ("heading") is rendered in a strong, sharp techno-font in white and sits prominently at the top, followed by a vibrant subheading ("subheading") in a bold cyan tone. On the right side, a circular price badge ("price") draws attention with a gradient blue background and white text. At the bottom, beneath a concise feature line ("description"), a bright cyan call-to-action button ("cta_background" and "cta") invites engagement.

**Color Palette:**
- Midnight Navy: `#0D1520`
- Deep Slate Blue: `#18293D`
- Electric Cyan: `#00C2FF`
- Bright Sky Blue: `#0084FF`
- Pure White: `#FFFFFF`
- Button Text Midnight: `#0D1520`
product_color: The product image showcases a dynamic pair of black athletic shoes with a futuristic sole design. The dominant color is deep black (#000000), paired with contrasting white (#FFFFFF) elements in the branding and side stripe patterns. The texture of the mesh upper and the cutout sole structure adds depth, while the sleek matte and semi-glossy black surfaces subtly blend together to enhance the visual appeal. The white stripes and logo provide bold highlights that make the design pop. For an advertisement banner, a monochrome palette with accents of silver-gray (#A9A9A9) and metallic charcoal (#2E2E2E) can reinforce the modern, performance-driven theme.
